channel.title: GitHub on Cecina Babich Morrow
channel.description: Recent content in GitHub on Cecina Babich Morrow

item.title: Creating this website
item.description: Getting started Iâ€™ve been contemplating the idea of creating a website for sometime, but my initial (mostly half-hearted) attempts ran into some serious technological glitches. I started out trying to create a GitHub site using Jekyll, since I knew I wanted my website to be hosted via GitHub to keep all of my code in the same place. After about an hour of unsuccessful commits that resulted in a lovely white page with my name on it, I scrapped the whole venture until I heard about the blogdown R package.
